mapper.insert: INSERT into company_job_score (id, name_cn, name_en, state, job_id, create_id, create_time, last_update_id, last_update_time) VALUES (#{id}, #{nameCn}, #{nameEn}, #{state}, #{jobId}, #{createId}, #{createTime}, #{createId}, #{createTime})
mapper.select: SELECT a.id, a.name_cn nameCn, a.name_en nameEn, a.job_id jobId FROM company_job_score a WHERE a.state != '3' AND a.id = #{id}
mapper.update:
UPDATE company_job_score
state = #{state},
WHERE id = #{id} AND state != '3'

UPDATE company_job_score
state = #{state},
WHERE job_id = #{jobId} AND state != '3'
mapper.select: SELECT a.id, a.name_cn title, '0' parentId, true isLast, '[{"type": "0", "isChecked": "0"}]' checkArr, '1' level FROM company_job_score a WHERE a.state = '1' AND a.job_id = #{jobId}
